http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd"> - <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> - <parent> - <groupId>com.xpn.xwiki.platform.skins</groupId> - <artifactId>xwiki-skins</artifactId> - <version>10-SNAPSHOT</version> - </parent> - <artifactId>xwiki-skin-toucan</artifactId> - <name>XWiki Platform - Skins - Toucan</name> - <version>1.12-SNAPSHOT</version> - <packaging>pom</packaging> - <description> - Toucan Skin. It is based on Albatross and requires that Albatross be set as
the base skin - in xwiki.cfg to work. - </description> - <dependencies> - <!-- Toucan skin requires the Albatross Skin v1.1 or greater at runtime --> - <dependency> - <groupId>com.xpn.xwiki.platform.skins</groupId> - <artifactId>xwiki-skin-albatross</artifactId> - <version>1.13-SNAPSHOT</version> - <scope>runtime</scope> - <type>zip</type> - </dependency> - </dependencies> - <build> - <plugins> - <plugin> - <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> - <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId> - </plugin> - </plugins> - </build> -</project>
